naslov: Seget Donji, prekrasna Villa s bazenom i pogledom na more (iznajmljivanje)
opis: Novo imanje Izvrsna lokacija (10 minuta hoda do netaknutih plaža i neobičnog ribarskog mjesta Seget), 20 minuta hoda do grada Trogira. Posredujemo u najmu moderne ville s bazenom i otvorenim pogledom na more u Segetu Donjem. U prizemlju se nalazi prostrani i otvoreni prostor kuhinje, blagovaone i dnevnog boravka s izlazom na terasu uz koju je bazen sa sunčalištem. Na katu su prostrane 3 spavaće sobe svaka s pripadajućim kupatilom, klimom i super king size krevetom i balkonima, te Salon na krovnoj terasi savršen za opuštanje s neprekinutim i predivnim pogledom na more. Potpuno opremljena kuhinja, TV sa SAT kanalima, stol za bilijar, grijani bazen okružen zelenim vrtom, tradicionalni roštilj u stražnjem dijelu, parking. U blizini trgovina, restorani, kafići i ostalo. Dugoročni najam, slobodno od 01.10.2024., min. 1 godinu i duže. Mogućnost i kraćeg perioda od 01.10.2024. - 01.06.2025. Cijena 3.500€/mj. + režije + polog (povrat po isteku najma). Naplaćuje se ag.provizija u visini 1 mj. najma. ENGLISH New property Excellent location (10 minutes walk to pristine beaches and the unusual fishing village of Seget), 20 minutes walk to the city of Trogir. We mediate the rental of a modern villa with a swimming pool and an open view of the sea in Seget Donji. On the ground floor there is a spacious and open area of ​​the kitchen, dining room and living room with access to the terrace next to which there is a swimming pool with a sunbathing area. Upstairs there are 3 spacious bedrooms, each with its own bathroom, air conditioning and a super king size bed and balconies, and a lounge on the roof terrace perfect for relaxing with an uninterrupted and beautiful view of the sea. Fully equipped kitchen, TV with satellite channels, pool table, heated pool surrounded by a green garden, traditional barbecue in the back, parking. Shops, restaurants, cafes, etc. are nearby. Long-term lease, available from 01.10.2024, min. 1 year and longer. Possibility of a shorter period from 01.10.2024. -  01.06.2025. Price 3,500€/monthly + utilities + deposit (return at the end of the lease). An agency commission in the amount of 1 month's rent is charged.
Troškovi: Iznos agencijske provizije koju plaća najmoprimac: 3500 EUR
